price: Saa Da no ayͻnkofoͻ bεdane atamfoͻ ama wͻn ho wͻn ho, gyesε Nyamesurofoͻ no.
arabic: ٱلۡأَخِلَّآءُ يَوۡمَئِذِۭ بَعۡضُهُمۡ لِبَعۡضٍ عَدُوٌّ إِلَّا ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: al-akhilāu yawma-idhin baʿḍuhum libaʿḍin ʿaduwwun illā al-mutaqīna
